item.title: New in .NET 10 and C# 14: EF Core 10's Faster Production Queries
item.description: .NET 10 is officially out, along with C# 14. Microsoft has released .NET 10 as Long-Term Support (LTS) as a successor to .NET 8. Like every version, it is not just an update but brings something new to the table. In this series, we will explore which aspects of software Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/new-in-net-10-and-c-14-ef-core-10s-faster-production-queries/
